channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Blocked drain by Tower Bridge Accumulator chimney, 19th July
item.description:
Blocked drain on the road by Tower Bridge Accumulator chimney. Water is leaking into Tower Bridge Engine rooms museum.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 226, Tower Bridge Road, Bermondsey, London

item.title: Noisy and loose Manhole cover, 19th July
item.description:
Patch in road outside 4d Le May Avenue is very noisy and loose. It bangs every time traffic passes over it. Its right by the bus stop and the noise is terrible both during the day and night. I have reported it before months ago. please can something be done soon to fix it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Le May Avenue, Chinbrook, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bins overflowing and ribbish all around, 19th July
item.description:
Bins overflowing so bags of rubbish left beside. Ripped open, maybe by foxes. Numerous plastic bottles
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Abbott's Walk, West Heath, London

item.title: Loose items of rubbish dumped outside 182 Gloucester Terrace, 19th July
item.description:
I've just watched someone tip out a bag of loose items of rubbish next to the tree outside 182 Gloucester Terrace. Doubtful the refuse collectors will pick this up and it will attract foxes later for sure.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 182, Gloucester Terrace, Paddington, London
Report on FixMyStreet
